instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1466: What is A1466? A1466 is a model number for a 13 inch size MacBook Air from years Early 2015, 2017, Mid 2012, Mid 2013, Early 2014 with EMC 2925, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00165, 820-3209, 820-3437..
definitions.820-00165: What is 820-00165? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.
definitions.PPBUS_G3H: What is PPBUS_G3H? Main system power rail that charges the battery, or is power from the battery, that everything else is powered from. .

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Short
threads.message:
Hi
I have a Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> no damage liquid board clean.
I found L7310 <SIGNAL>PPVCC_S0_CPU_PH1</SIGNAL> diode mode OL probe red at ground
and ohm valu 0 ohm
<SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> 0V
No power , no green light, i check <SIGNAL>PPBUS_G3H</SIGNAL> 0V with my power supply i found 0V 
Can you help me please.

threads.title: Macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1466</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00165</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER> Short
threads.message:
"I found L7310 <SIGNAL>PPVCC_S0_CPU_PH1</SIGNAL> diode mode OL probe red at ground
and ohm valu 0 ohm"
OL means infinite, and 0 ohm neans short.
Can you explain this impossibility???

Stop to consider short any low value!!!
Depends where it is measured.
As already explained in other thread, CPU coils have low ohm value to ground as normal.
You MUST post exact ohm value in such case, to make an idea if is really short, or not.
